p: Sánchez-González et al. [ 17] tested biodegradable coatings with and without bergamot essential oil (from Citrus × bergamia Risso & Poit.) on table grapes ( V. vinifera L.) during storage. They found that incorporation of bergamot essential oil improved the antimicrobial activity of the coatings and significantly reduced mold, yeast, and mesophile counts.
